title: Alpine Mt Buller Group Retreat with Ski Hire & Daily Breakfast
description:
Escape to Australia's premier winter wonderland this snow season with a cosy stay at Alpine Retreat Mount Buller. Located just over a three-hour drive from Melbourne, this retro-inspired ski resort is beautifully nestled in the heart of the alpine village at the top of Mount Buller's powder-soft slopes - only moments from the Bourke Street ski run.

Featuring a collection of well-appointed, chalet-themed rooms that can accommodate up to six guests, an onsite bar for cool aprés-ski drinks and an Italian restaurant with hearty cuisine, this quaint accommodation provides a warming retreat for a group of friends or the whole family after fun-filled days in the snow.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Wake up with daily continental breakfast featuring a selection of cereals, toast, jams, fresh fruit, juice, tea and coffee
- Get up close to the slopes with a one-day complimentary ski or snowboard hire per person
- Celebrate your snowy escape with a complimentary après-ski drink per person at Off-Piste Bar
- Head to Dolomiti Italiano restaurant and enjoy one regular pizza to share

**Travelling as a larger group?** Upgrade to a Mezzanine Room, perfectly sized for up to six guests. Based on European chalet-style lodgings, these rooms are ideal for larger groups looking for more space with a double bed, bunk beds and twin single beds on the loft-style mezzanine floor.

**Please note:** Check-in and check-out is not available on Saturdays.
offer_address: 6 Stirling Road, Mt Buller, Victoria 3723, Australia

title: Victoria High Country Alpine Apartments near Mount Buller with Daily Breakfast & Welcome Bottle of Wine
description:
Leave the hustle of the city behind and escape to Victoria's High Country for a relaxing, ski-friendly apartment stay at this secluded retreat ensconced between the charming town of Mansfield and the alpine slopes of Mount Buller. Surrounded by acres of lush greenery, gourmet eateries, wineries and sleepy rivers, this peaceful resort is perfect for group escapes or a romantic weekend trip.

The High Country and Great Dividing Range region, renowned for its walking and cycling trails, cosy pubs, quaint cafes, and forested landscape, is on your doorstep and just waiting to be explored. After a day outdoors, relax and unwind in your blissfully private, self-contained apartment, offering easy access to a seasonal outdoor pool, spa and sauna, a private lake for boating and fishing and 18-hole mini-golf course.

title: Mount Buller's #1 Ski Resort Stay with Ski Hire & Daily Breakfast
description:
If you're chasing an endless, action-packed winter, Mount Buller's #1 ski resort, Duck Inn, is the place to do it. Ski to your heart’s content on the runs of Victoria’s most-loved alpine village with a stay at this recently refurbished hotel, ideally located a five-minute walk from the slopes. Glide past snow-covered gums with the alpine chill on your cheeks and feel the tranquil stillness of over 80km of perfectly kept runs, only disturbed by the whir of 22 lifts and people skiing across 300 hectares of terrain - perfect for experienced skiers and beginners alike.

When you're not making the most of the perfectly manicured slopes, gliding past frosted trees and enjoying the invigorating kiss of cold air on your face, curl up with a glass of red and defrost by the gas fireplace of Duck Inn's cosy restaurant. No wonder the hotel is rated #1 ski resort in Mount Buller on Tripadvisor.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Fuel up for a day on the slopes with daily continental breakfast
- Enjoy one full day of ski or board hire for two
- Stay cosy in the cold with one-day snow jacket and pants hire for two

**Family Upgrade:** Travelling with family? Upgrade to a Family Room, featuring a queen bed and one single bed with inclusions valid for two adults and one child (aged 11 years and under) - perfect for a family winter getaway.
offer_address: 18 Goal Post Rd, Mount Buller VIC 3723

title: Ski Season Adventure Perfect for Families and Groups with Ski Hire Included
description: Take a break from the ordinary and escape to Alpine Retreat Mt Buller, located in Australia’s premier winter wonderland. Whether you want to ski atop a mountain or grab a board and head for the slopes, you'll find the perfect place to unwind after days of adventure at Alpine Retreat Mt Buller, whose rooms are full of retro charm and laid-back atmosphere. Perfect for families and large groups, the weekday package for four includes daily continental breakfast, one day of ski or snowboard hire, one complimentary pizza at Dolomiti Italiano Restaurant and one après-ski drink at Off-Piste Bar. Upgrades for up to six available.
offer_address: 6 Stirling Road, Mt Buller, Victoria 3723, Australia
